feature_model.name: MinePump

meta.data: Classen, A. Modelling with FTS: a Collection of Illustrative Examples. Technical Report P-CS-TR SPLMC-00000001, PReCISE Research Center, University of Namur, Namur, Belgium, 2010.

feature_model.feature_tree: :r MinePumpSys(MinePumpSys) :o Command(Command) :g (_r_1_12) [1,*] : Start(Start) : Stop(Stop) :m WaterRegulation(WaterRegulation) :o Low(Low) :o Normal(Normal) :m High(High) :o MethaneDetect(MethaneDetect)
